dcterms:description: The Sentinel-2 dataset used in this study consists of harmonized surface reflectance products resampled from the original 10m to 30m resolution, adjusted to Landsat 8 spectral response function, and includes a time series of images for the years 2016-2020.
dcterms:title: Sentinel-2

dcterms:description: The National Agriculture Imagery Program (NAIP) dataset consists of high-resolution aerial imagery used for land cover classification and segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: National Agriculture Imagery Program (NAIP)

dcterms:creator: J. Allenby
C. Phelan
dcterms:description: The Chesapeake Bay watershed land cover dataset provides detailed land cover classifications for the Chesapeake Bay area, used for precision conservation efforts.
dcterms:title: Chesapeake Bay watershed land cover dataset

dcterms:creator: W. Kleynhans
B. P. Salmon
J. C. Olivier
F. Vanden Bergh
K. J. Wessels
T. L. Grobler
K. C. Steenkamp
dcterms:description: The MODIS dataset is used for land cover change detection through autocorrelation analysis on time-series data, particularly for identifying new human settlements.
dcterms:title: MODIS
